languages.text: "В каком из вышеперечисленных пунктов? Каждый из них опирается на факты, а вывод изложил проктор Антар. Кроме того, окончательное суждение будет выносить маршал Стракс".

traits.locale_text: "В каком из вышеперечисленных пунктов? Мои выводы основаны исключительно на соответствующих инструкциях, знанием о которых обладает каждый Арбитес".

languages.text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."
languages.original_text: "В каком из вышеперечисленных пунктов? Каждый из них опирается на факты, а вывод изложил проктор Антар. Кроме того, окончательное суждение будет выносить маршал Стракс".

traits.locale_text: "Which part of the assessment would you accuse of bias? Everything is based on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

"Which part of the assessment would you accuse of bias? Everything is based on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

"To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

"To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

"To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

"To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

languages.text: 「その評価のどの部分に偏見があるとお考えですか？すべての内容は事実のみに基づいており、結論はアンサール代理人自身が提示したものです。いずれにせよ、最終的な判決はストラッチス将帥が下すことになります」
languages.original_text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: 「その評価のどの部分に偏見があるとお考えですか？すべての内容は事実のみに基づいており、結論はアンサール代理人自身が提示したものです。いずれにせよ、最終的な判決はストラッチス将帥が下すことになります」

languages.text: "Welchen Teil der Beurteilung würdet Ihr anzweifeln? Alles basiert allein auf Fakten und Proktor Anthar selbst hat die Lösung präsentiert. Das abschließende Urteil wird allerdings Marschall Strachs fällen."
languages.original_text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: "Welchen Teil der Beurteilung würdet Ihr anzweifeln? Alles basiert allein auf Fakten und Proktor Anthar selbst hat die Lösung präsentiert. Das abschließende Urteil wird allerdings Marschall Strachs fällen."

languages.text: « Pourriez-vous m'indiquer pour quelle raison vous pensez que cette évaluation est biaisée ? Chaque élément s'appuie uniquement sur des faits avérés, et le proctor Anthar a présenté lui-même cette conclusion. Cependant, le jugement final sera rendu par le maréchal Strachs. »
languages.original_text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: « Pourriez-vous m'indiquer pour quelle raison vous pensez que cette évaluation est biaisée ? Chaque élément s'appuie uniquement sur des faits avérés, et le proctor Anthar a présenté lui-même cette conclusion. Cependant, le jugement final sera rendu par le maréchal Strachs. »

languages.text: «¿Qué parte de la evaluación considera sesgada? Todo su contenido está basado en los hechos, y es el Procurador Anthar quien presentó la conclusión. De todos modos, el veredicto final está en manos del Mariscal Strachs».
languages.original_text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué parte de la evaluación considera sesgada? Todo su contenido está basado en los hechos, y es el Procurador Anthar quien presentó la conclusión. De todos modos, el veredicto final está en manos del Mariscal Strachs».

languages.text: “你认为这场评估的哪些部分存在偏见？整场评估的所有环节都完全以事实为基础，而结论也是安萨监察官本人承认的。不过，无论如何，最终评判结果将由斯塔克斯元帅下达。”
languages.original_text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: “你认为这场评估的哪些部分存在偏见？整场评估的所有环节都完全以事实为基础，而结论也是安萨监察官本人承认的。不过，无论如何，最终评判结果将由斯塔克斯元帅下达。”

languages.text: "Değerlendirmenin hangi kısmında ön yargı söz konusu? Değerlendirmenin tamamı yalnızca gerçeklere dayanmakta. Hatta sonucu Üsteğmen Anthar bizzat sundu. Her hâlükârda nihai kararı Miralay Strachs verecek."
languages.original_text: "To which part of the assessment would you impute bias? Everything in it is based solely on facts, and Proctor Anthar himself presented the conclusion. Regardless, the final judgement will be passed by Marshal Strachs."

traits.locale_text: "Değerlendirmenin hangi kısmında ön yargı söz konusu? Değerlendirmenin tamamı yalnızca gerçeklere dayanmakta. Hatta sonucu Üsteğmen Anthar bizzat sundu. Her hâlükârda nihai kararı Miralay Strachs verecek."
